name: War Arms Dealer
description:
War Inc is a game about arms dealer that tries to balance the war between 2 sides
your job is to give arms to 2 different sides to make war last longer. 

First Design your product then create you prototype in lab then sell them but becarefull if you give one side more power you will lose the equilibrium you have to design your weapons depending on the state of the war.

HOW TO PLAY

-------------------

First click on design button to create your design you have 3 type of 
weapons to create infantry,tank,artilery use sliders to change its stat 
and use trait button to add traits to your weapons then click to lab button 
to create your prototype with money you have then sell you weapon to one side 
depending on the situation of the war you can look into the detailed war 
situation in war button.
